entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
